name: Abandoned Merchant Siofra River
description: Abandoned Merchant Siofra River is an NPC and one of several Nomadic Merchants in Elden Ring. Abandoned Merchants sell various items and equipment including Consumables, Materials, Weapons and Armor as well as notes containing hints on how to acquire certain items. This Abandoned Merchant can be found inside one of the ruins in Central Siofra River.

name: Aeonian Spirit
location: Northern cliff of Swamp of Aeonia
description: The Aeonian Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He stands upon the northern cliffs of the Swamp of Aeonia.

name: Aeonian Swamp Spirit
description: The Aeonian Swamp Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He rests on the shore of the swamp and looks out towards the Heart of Aeonia.

name: Albinauric Village Spirit
description: The Albinauric Village Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. Located in the Village of the Albinaurics, he wishes for Albus' safety and gives you a hint on how to find him.

name: Albus
location: Village of the Albinaurics, Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Albus is an NPC in Elden Ring. Albus is an Albinauric who is trying to hide from the calamity that befell Village of the Albinaurics in Liurnia of the Lakes. He has an important item that he would like you to protect

name: Sir Ansbach
role: Pureblood Knight Captain (former), NPC Quest Related
description: Sir Ansbach is an NPC in Elden Ring. Sir Ansbach is a former servant of Mohg, Lord of Blood, but is now part of the group that follows Miquella through the Realm of Shadow. Sir Ansbach is an NPC exclusive to Shadow of the Erdtree and does not appear in the base game.

name: Ashen Spirit
description: Ashen Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. Ashen Spirit can be found sitting on the ground in the ash.

name: Blackguard Big Boggart
description: Blackguard Big Boggart is an NPC in Elden Ring. Initially encountered as the thief of Rya's Necklace, he is a minor NPC and merchant.

name: Blaidd the Half-Wolf
description: Mistwood Ruins Forlorn Hound Evergaol Siofra River Redmane Castle Three Sisters

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura
location: Limgrave: near Seaside RuinsLiurnia of the Lakes: Near Raya Lucaria Academy entrance.Altus Plateau: Second Church of Marika
description: Limgrave: near Seaside RuinsLiurnia of the Lakes: Near Raya Lucaria Academy entrance.Altus Plateau: Second Church of Marika

name: Boc the Seamster
description: Boc the Seamster is an NPC in Elden Ring. Boc is a Demi-Human who is capable of advanced communication. Boc is initially met by the player in the form of a small tree.

name: Brother Corhyn
description: Brother Corhyn is an NPC in Elden Ring. Brother Corhyn is a holy practitioner who will teach you practical faith-based Incantations in exchange for Runes. You will encounter him once you've reached the Roundtable Hold.

name: Carian Manor Spirit
description: The Carian Manor Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found sitting on a chair, inside the

name: Church of Pilgrimage Spirit
description: The Church of Pilgrimage Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. They can be found outside of the Church of Pilgrimage in the Weeping Peninsula.

name: Count Ymir, High Priest
description: Count Ymir, High Priest is an NPC in Elden Ring. Count Ymir, High Priest is a High Priest who oversees the Cathedral of Manus Metyr. He sells a collection of spells that can be purchased with runes. He has a servant named Jolan, who can be summoned during certain fights after progressing his questline. Count Ymir, High Priest is an NPC exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC and does not appear in the base game.

name: D, Beholder of Death
description: D, Beholder of Death (real name: Devin) is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found in Nokron, Eternal City, east of the Great Waterfall Basin grace. To interact with D, Beholder of Death, you need the Twinned Armor. If given the armor, he will be available as a summon against the Valiant Gargoyle pair. He is the twin brother of Darian, also known as D, Hunter of the Dead.

name: D, Hunter of the Dead
description: D, Hunter of the Dead is an NPC in Elden Ring. D is a hunter of the undead who can be found where the Tibia Mariner boss is located, and later at the Roundtable Hold. When you first encounter D, he will warn you that the nearby small town of Summonwater Village has been taken over by a Mariner. If the player shows him Deathroot and takes him up on his offer of introduction, he will mark your map with a red "Sending Gate" waypoint, indicating that it will take you to the Beast Clergymen.

name: Deathtouched Spirit
description: The Deathtouched Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found sitting defeated out the front of the Deathtouched Catacombs in Northern Limgrave.

name: Knight Diallos
description: Diallos is an NPC in Elden Ring. Diallos is a noble you'll come across at the Roundtable Hold. Upon welcoming you, he mentions that he's looking for a loyal servant to his house called Lanya, and asks you to tell him if you happen to come across her.

name: Dragon Communion Priestess
description: Dragon Communion Priestess is an NPC in Elden Ring. Dragon Communion Priestess is a survivor of the ancient dragon worshippers, or also known as servants of Dragonlord Placidusax. Dragon Communion Priestess is exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC and does not appear in the base game.

name: Dryleaf Dane
description: Dryleaf Dane is an NPC in Elden Ring. Dryleaf Dane is an NPC exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion. Dryleaf Dane is a master of hand-to-hand combat, he leaves a Monk's Missive for travelers to find and wish to seek a challenge and learn the way of the warrior.

name: Dung Eater
description: Roundtable Hold

name: Eclipse Spirit
description: The Eclipse Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be seen praying inside the Church of Eclipse.

name: Edgar
description: Edgar is an NPC in Elden Ring. Edgar is Irina's father and introduces himself as the warden of Castle Morne. He can be found sitting on a bench in a non-hostile area of the ramparts of the castle. His NPC Summon Sign can be used to fight against the Leonine Misbegotten once he has received Irina's Letter.

name: Ensha of the Royal Remains
description: Ensha of the Royal Remains or Ensha is an NPC in Elden Ring. He will refuse to speak to the player, but instead stare at them. He is the servant of Gideon Ofnir.

name: Erdtree Sanctuary Spirit
description: Erdtree Sanctuary Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He is sitting in a chair facing the bridge that connects the Queen's Bedchamber to the Elden Throne.

name: Fia, Deathbed Companion
description: Fia is an NPC in Elden Ring. Fia is a deathbed companion that you will find inside a small bedroom at the Roundtable Hold. Her embrace will give you a special consumable that can increase poise called the Baldachin's Blessing, at the cost of a debuff that slightly decreases your maximum HP. You can ostensibly come back for more if you happen to run out of this consumable. Fia's Questline Steps are highlighted below.

name: Finger Maiden Therolina
description: Finger Maiden Therolina is an NPC in Elden Ring. Finger Maiden Therolina is a sorcerer controlled by Seluvis and one of participants in Radahns' Festival

name: Fire Knight Queelign
location: NPC Invader:Belurat Tower SettlementChurch of CrusadePhysical Body:Church District, Shadow Keep
description: Fire Knight Queelign is an NPC in Elden Ring. Fire Knight Queelign is an NPC exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion, he is a knight who pledges his loyalty to Marika. Fire Knight Queelign is first encountered as an NPC Invader in Belurat Tower Settlement and at the Church of Crusade.

name: Frenzied Spirit
description: The Frenzied Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be seen near the Church of Inhibition of in Northern Liurnia.

name: Redmane Freyja
description: Redmane Freyja is an NPC in Elden Ring. Redmane Freyja is a former follower of Radahn, but is now a fervent follower of Miquella. Redmane Freyja is an NPC that can be found exclusively in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, and can't be found in the base game.

name: Frustrated Spirit
description: Frustrated Spirit was an NPC in Elden Ring. Frustrated Spirit would lay beside the gates to a Colosseum North-East of Stormhill Shack.

name: The Gate Town Bridge Spirit
description: The Gate Town Bridge Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He is upset over the Raya Lucaria Academy closing their gates to him.

name: Gatekeeper Gostoc
description: Gatekeeper Gostoc is an NPC in Elden Ring. Gatekeeper Gostoc is an old tall fellow that may seem a bit suspicious, but he seems to want to help. It is your choice to trust him or not.

name: Gideon Ofnir
description: Gideon Ofnir is an NPC in Elden Ring. Gideon Ofnir is the leader of Roundtable Hold and a profound source of knowledge. He can be found most commonly at his office, absorbed by an endless amount of books.

name: Godwyn the Golden
description: Godwyn the Golden was a demigod and son of Queen Marika the Eternal and Godfrey the First Elden Lord. In the "Night of the Black Knives" he was assassinated by assassins from the land of the Numen with the use of daggers imbued with the Rune of Death. Godwyn the Golden was the firstborn son of Queen Marika the Eternal and her consort Godfrey, the First Elden Lord. Godwyn was a scion of the so-called "Golden Line", of which Godrick the Grafted was the final descendant. Early in his mother's divine reign, the Erdtree came under assault by the Dragons, who had ruled the world before Marika's ascent. The forces of the Erdtree managed to triumph against the dragons, with Godwyn prevailing against the dreaded Fortissax, earning the mighty dragon's friendship in the process. Godwyn would eventually meet his end during the Night of Black Knives. Seeking to be free from her fate as a pawn of the Greater Will, Godwyn's step-sister Lunar Princess Ranni stole a fragment of the rune of death from Maliketh, imbuing the weapons of Numen assassins with the rune. Ranni wished to shed her Empyrean body but preserve her spirit, which meant that someone else's spirit would need to die. Nevertheless, when the assassins fell upon the Royal Capital and murdered Godwyn, his soul was destroyed and left only his soulless body behind. He was the first demigod in history to die since the ascension of Marika to the throne of the Lands Between. Godwyn's death would be the catalyst for the Shattering of the Elden Ring, plunging the kingdom into chaos without the guidance of the Greater Will. Due to Ranni's ritual, Godwyn's flesh was branded with half of the cursemark of death and he became the first of Those Who Live in Death. His body was laid to rest deep in the roots of the Erdtree, but it would eventually corrupt it, leading Deathroot to sprout across the Lands Between, causing others to also rise in undeath. These undead worshipped Godwyn as the Prince of Death, believing he would eventually return and lead them. An aspect of Godwyn's corpse appeared in the depths of Stormveil Castle and is responsible for the loss of Rogier's legs. Many figures, including his half-brother Miquella and his companion Fortissax, tried to cure him of his condition and allow him a proper death, but to no avail. The deathbed companion Fia would become a leading figure among Those Who Live in Death, eventually making her way to Godwyn's corpse. Having received the other half of the cursemark from Ranni's discarded body with help from a Tarnished champion, Fia lay with Godwyn to grant him a second life as the Prince of Death. As a result of their union, Fia conceived a rune, which a champion seeking to become Elden Lord might use to mend the Elden Ring, reimbuing the principle of death within the Golden Order.

name: Goldmask
location: Altus Plateau Leyndell, Royal CapitalMountaintops of the Giants
description: Altus Plateau Leyndell, Royal CapitalMountaintops of the Giants

name: Grape Spirit
description: The Grape Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. Located in Stormveil Castle. He is looking for a maiden to give his grapes to and seems to have lost one, since a Shabiri Grape can be found beside him.

name: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
description: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman is an NPC in Elden Ring. Gurranq appears to be a large, hunched creature that lies isolated in the Bestial Sanctum. Constantly hungering for Deathroot, he will reward those who offer it to him.

name: Hermit Merchant (Leyndell)
location: Hermit Merchant's Shack, Leyndell Royal Capital
description: Hermit Merchant (Leyndell) is an NPC in Elden Ring. Hermit Merchant (Leyndell) lives a life of seclusion within Hermit Merchant (Leyndell)'s Shack.

name: Hornsent
description: Hornsent is an NPC in Elden Ring. Hornsent can be found alongside Freyja at the Three-Paths Cross in the Realm of Shadow. He is exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, and can't be found in the base game.

name: Hornsent Grandam
description: Hornsent Grandam is an NPC in Elden Ring. Hornsent Grandam is a member of the antique race that inhabited Belurat, Tower Settlement. Her people were set to the torch by Messmer the Impaler and his forces. Hornsent Grandam is an NPC exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, and is not present in the base game.

name: Hyetta
description: Liurnia of the LakesSubterranean Shunning-Grounds

name: Igon
description: Igon is an NPC in Elden Ring. Igon can be heard screaming in pain, and swearing revenge against a dragon. Igon is an NPC exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC and does not appear in the base game.

name: Imprisoned Merchant
description: Imprisoned Merchant is an NPC and Merchant in Elden Ring. Similar to Nomadic Merchants, the Imprisoned Merchant serves as a general goods vendor, selling various Consumables, Ammunition and other items. He can be found inside the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.

name: Irina
description: Irina is an NPC in Elden Ring. Irina is a blind character wearing a ribbon over her eyes, and a dirty dress stained with blood. She can be encountered just beyond the Bridge of Sacrifice, on the Weeping Peninsula Side. Irina warns you about a rebellion in Castle Morne, and asks you to deliver a letter to her father, commander of the castle forces.

name: Isolated Merchant Raya Lucaria
location: Raya Lucaria Academy, Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Raya Lucaria

name: Jolan
description: Jolan is an NPC in Elden Ring. Jolan is a servant dressed in all black and can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr. In the same room where you speak with Count Ymir, she can be seen on the pillar to your right.

name: Kenneth Haight
description: Kenneth Haight is an NPC in Elden Ring. Kenneth Haight claims to be the next ruler of Limgrave, you will encounter him as you make your way down the ledges at Limgrave. Haight will ask for your help to clean and clear out Fort Haight that's currently being overrun by different enemies.

name: Kingsrealm Spirit
description: Kingsrealm Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. Kingrealm Spirit rests at the Kingsrealm Ruins in Northern Liurnia.

name: Knight Bernahl
description: Knight Bernahl (later known as Recusant Bernahl) is an NPC in Elden Ring. Bernahl is a Tarnished Knight initially found at the Warmaster's Shack in central Stormhill. He serves as an Ash of War merchant, selling various ashes in exchange for Runes. He is also involved in certain questlines and will move locations according to player progress. Upon meeting him and progressing his storyline, he can become available as an NPC Summon against the Godskin Duo, as well as an NPC Invader.

name: Laiedd Spirit
description: The Laiedd Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He is hiding in Fort Laiedd.

name: Latenna
location: Liurnia of the Lakes, Slumbering Wolf's Shack
description: Latenna is an NPC in Elden Ring. Latenna can be found after finishing the Lakeside Crystal Cave dungeon located under the southern ridge of Liurnia. She willingly becomes a Spirit to join the player, becoming Latenna the Albinauric.

name: Lionel the Lionhearted
description: Lionel the Lionhearted is an NPC in Elden Ring. Lionel the Lionhearted acts as the Father of Fia and can be encountered as an NPC Invader as one of Fia's Champions. He is also available as an NPC Summon and can be seen wielding a Great Epee, as well as the Prince of Deaths Staff, casting Rancorcall and Fias Mist.

name: Liurnian Highway Spirit
description: The Liurnian Highway Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found on the Liurnia Highway in a defeated position, talking about puppet soliders.

name: Liurnian Lake Spirit
location: Near Revengers Shack, Liurnia of the Lakes
description: The Liurnian Lake Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found knelt down in the shallow water, just east of the Revenger's Shack.

name: Lost Snow Spirit
description: The Lost Snow Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He is lost and looking for the Haligtree.

name: Master Lusat
description: Master Lusat is an NPC in Elden Ring. Master Lusat can be found at Sellia Hideaway.

name: Melina
location: The beginning of the Tarnished's journey.

name: Merchant Kale
description: Merchant Kale is a Merchant and NPC in Elden Ring. Merchant Kale can be found in Limgrave: Church of Elleh, soon after emerging from the Stranded Graveyard at the start of the game, youll see a building to the North which is the Church of Elleh.

name: Millicent's Sisters
description: Millicent's Sisters is a NPC collective in Elden Ring. They are group of female warriors associated with Gowry.

name: Miquella
description: Miquella, also known as Miquella the Kind, is a background character in Elden Ring and a central character in Shadow of the Erdtree. One of the Empyrean children of Queen Marika, he is the twin brother of Malenia, Blade of Miquella, together known as the Twin Prodigies. It is revealed that Miquella has stripped himself of his flesh and Empyrean lineage in the Land of Shadow, a place obscured by the Erdtree and purged in an unsung war.

name: Miriel, Pastor of Vows
description: Miriel, Pastor of Vows is an NPC in Elden Ring. Miriel, Pastor of Vows is the Liurna Church of Vow's steward, a huge silver tortoise wearing a mitre. He first interacts with you when arriving at the Church of Vows. Miriel, Pastor of Vows welcomes you and offers to share their knowledge of Sorceries and Incantations, as well as lore on certain characters.

name: Moore
description: Moore is an NPC in Elden Ring. Moore is one of the followers of Miquella. A gentle giant that also acts as a Merchant. Moore is an NPC exclusive to the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC and does not appear in the base game.

name: Morne Spirit
description: The Morne Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found locked inside a cage behind the castle.

name: Needle Knight Leda
description: Needle Knight Leda is an NPC in Elden Ring. Needle Knight Leda is the leader of Miquella's band of followers in the Realm of Shadow. She is an NPC exclusive to Shadow of the Erdtree and does not appear in the base game.

name: Nepheli Loux, Warrior
description: Nepheli Loux, Warrior is an NPC in Elden Ring. Nepheli Loux is a warrior and fellow tarnished who was ordered by decree from her adoptive father to kill and dethrone Godrick. She wears clothing similar to the starting Hero class, and she can help you in the battle against Godrick the Grafted if summoned. Her summoning sign is golden and is just outside the boss fog. Other NPC Summon opportunities include boss fights against Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Omenkiller (in Village of the Albinaurics). Progress in her questline to have her summon sign available for these encounters.

name: Nomadic Merchant Central ALTUS PLATEAU
description: Central ALTUS PLATEAU

name: Patches
location: Murkwater Cave, LimgraveLiurniaMt. GelmirVolcano ManorThe Shaded Castle
description: Patches the Untethered is a Merchant, NPC, and Field Boss in Elden Ring. Patches is a recurring character in From Software games, usually playing the part of a trickster. He can be found in Murkwater Cave. This is an optional boss as players do not need to defeat him to advance.

name: Pidia, Carian Servant
description: Pidia, Carian Servant is an NPC in Elden Ring, found in Caria Manor. He sells high end goods.

name: Preceptor Seluvis
description: Preceptor Seluvis is an NPC in Elden Ring. Seluvis is a pompous sorcerer in service to Ranni the Witch. Seluvis Questline is important for players looking to make Magic Builds, so make sure to read all the Seluvis Questline steps below including a potential lockout due to your choices. Seluvis is first encountered in spectral form at Ranni's Rise in the Three Sisters sub-region of Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
description: Primeval Sorcerer Azur is an NPC in Elden Ring. Azur can be found near the cliffs north of the Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir.

name: Queen Marika the Eternal
description: Queen Marika the Eternal is a background character in Elden Ring and Shadow of the Erdtree. She is the current ruler of the Lands Between, and the one who shattered the Elden Ring. She has many powerful Demigod offspring, who seek the Elden Ring's remaining power (see Elden Ring Timeline).

name: Renna
description: Aimee-Ffion Edwards

name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
description: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon is an NPC in Elden Ring. Rennala gives access to the Rebirth function, allowing the player to reallocate their stats by using a Larval Tear (also called respeccing). She can also be used to change the player's appearance.

name: Roderika
description: Roderika is an NPC in Elden Ring. Roderika is a spirit-tuner that you will encounter at Stormhill Shack on the trail to Stormveil. She will later move to the Roundtable Hold if you progress her quest.

name: Rya
description: Rya is an NPC in Elden Ring. Rya acts as a scout for the Volcano Manor, and is the adopted daughter of Tanith.

name: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
description: God-Devouring Serpent and Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy is a two-phase Demigod Boss in Elden Ring. The God-Devouring Serpent is a massive coiled serpent found at the Volcano Manor in Mt. Gelmir, and Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy is its true form that's revealed after the first phase is defeated. When Rykard offered himself up to the serpent in a pursuit of immortality, most of his followers turned on him and sought to bring him down with the Serpent-Hunter.

name: Sanguine Noble (NPC)
description: Sanguine Noble is an NPC enemy invader located in the Consecrated Snowfields. By heading West of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield grace, and just North of the Yelough Anix Ruins towards the cliff edge.

name: Shabriri
description: Shabriri is an NPC in Elden Ring. Shabriri can be found at the Mountaintops of the Giants and looks exactly the same as Bloody Finger Hunter Yura, as he implies the hunter died and he has been given his body. Shabriri can become available as an NPC Summon against Godfrey, First Elden Lord depending on questline progress and ending route.

name: The Shaded Castle Spirit
description: The Shaded Castle Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. The Shaded Castle Spirit lays defeated within The Shaded Castle.

name: Siofra River Spirit
description: The Siofra River Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be seen worshipping the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.

name: Smithing Master Hewg
description: Smithing Master Hewg is an NPC in Elden Ring. Hewg is an imprisoned Misbegotten blacksmith that can be found at the Roundtable Hold. He will upgrade your Weapons beyond the +3 level, as well as duplicating Ashes of War for a fee, provided you have the proper Materials.

name: Sorcerer Rogier
description: Stormveil Castle

name: Sorceress Sellen
location: Limgrave, Waypoint Ruins Weeping Peninsula, Witchbane Ruins
description: Sorceress Sellen is a Merchant and NPC in Elden Ring. She can be found inside the Waypoint Ruins, far east from where you first arrive in Limgrave. She can teach you Sorceries. She can also be made available as an NPC Summon for specific battles.

name: St. Trina
location: Garden of Deep Purple (Stone Coffin Fissure)
description: St. Trina is an NPC in Elden Ring. She can be found in Stone Coffin Fissure and is vital to the progression of Thiollier's questline. St. Trina was first mentioned in the base game in various items like St. Trina's Torch and resembles Miquella.

name: Stranded Graveyard Spirit
description: The Stranded Graveyard Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He is located in the Stranded Graveyard and tells you where the training area for the game is.

name: Study Hall Spirit
description: The Study Hall Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found inside the Carian Study Hall behind a pew.

name: Tanith
description: Tanith, Volcano Manor Proprietress is an NPC in Elden Ring. Tanith is the head of the Volcano Manor, and asks the players about joining forces against the Fingers. If you decide to join her quest, you will receive particular missions as well as access to some new Npcs.

name: The Great-Jar
description: The Great-Jar is an NPC in Elden Ring. The Great-Jar can be found in Northern Caelid, at the colosseum North of the Deep Siofra River Well Site of Grace.

name: The Two Fingers
description: The Two Fingers are an PC in Elden Ring. They are large, shriveled hands with only two fingers that are said to deliver messages of The Greater Will that only the finger readers can interpret.

name: Thiollier
location: Gravesite Plain, next to Pillar Path Cross
description: Thiollier is an NPC in Elden Ring. Thiollier has an eye for crafting poison and is not a fighter. Thiollier is an NPC that can be found exclusively in the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, and can't be found in the base game.

name: Thops
location: Church of Irith in Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Thops is an NPC in Elden Ring. Thops is a student at the Academy of Raya Lucaria. He can teach some rudimentary sorceries, provided you can spare a small donation of Runes first.

name: Three Fingers
description: Three Fingers is an NPC in Elden Ring. Three Fingers is an integral part of The Lord of Frenzied Flame ending and can be found near the Cathedral of the Forsaken, below the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

name: Tower of Return Spirit
location: On a Western cliff in the Weeping Peninsula
description: The Tower of Return Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He rests on a rock with a forlonging stare towards the Tower of Return.

name: Twin Maiden Husks
description: Twin Maiden Husks is an NPC and Merchant in Elden Ring. Twin Maiden Husks look like two Finger Readers, holding a staff, and will take Bell Bearing objects to expand their inventory, giving players an option to purchase many Upgrade Materials and the stores of any dead merchant.

name: Two Fingers
description: God

name: Volcano Manor Spirit
description: The Volcano Manor Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He rests in the Volcano Manor.

name: Wandering Artist Spirit
location: LimgraveLakes of LiurniaDragonbarrowAltus PlateauMountaintops of the Giants
description: The Wandering Artist Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He is the artist that painted the landscape paintings that can be collected through the Lands Between.For a guide and more information on the Wandering Artist Spirit's quest, visit the Paintings page.

name: Iji War Counselor & Carian Blacksmith
location: Kingsrealm Ruins, Western Liurnia of the Lakes
description: War Counselor Iji is an NPC in Elden Ring. War Counselor Iji (first encountered as Smithing Master Iji) is a gentle Troll in charge of the smithing for the Carian royals, but will also provide his services to the player.Find him by heading north into the slopes of Western Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: White Mask Varre
description: White Mask Varre is an NPC in Elden Ring. White Mask Varre is encountered near the start of the game, right by The First Step Site of Grace, and will offer advice to the player. He can be found multiple times in different locations as the story progresses.

name: Windmill Spirit
description: The Windmill Spirit is an NPC in Elden Ring. He can be found hiding from the Celebrants behind a cart and a wooden box in the Windmill Village.,

name: Witch-Hunter Jerren
location: Redmane Castle Academy of Raya Lucaria
description: Witch-Hunter Jerren is an NPC in Elden Ring. Jerren, first known as Castellan Jerren, is a part of the Sorceress Sellen questline. He can also be seen as a herald, making proclamations about the Radahn Festival around Redmane Castle just as the festival is getting prepared to start. He then initiates the festival. Jerren has the opportunity to fight alongside players as an NPC Summon.
